column5: This post made me laugh for five straight minutes this morning, I couldn't stop 😂😂😂 thank you OP 😂😂
Upvoting for "Codependent No More," a fantastic book!! And of course all the clearly delineated advice. Great comment all around 😁
Happy birthday!!! Congratulations on making it so many times around the sun! I'm glad you are here and I hope your next year brings great things for you ☺️

Dude, this totally sounds like an epic confrontation to me. Your bravery standing up to someone, ESPECIALLY your own family, in the face of a) never having done something like that before, and b) holding strong against her emotional manipulation + your mom's reaction, is FUCKING AMAZING in my book. Damn, I'm so inspired. Your crying/shaking doesn't discount in my book the STRENGTH you showed doing what you did. Damn!
Man, this is incredible to hear and I'm incredibly proud of you. I'm so glad you're still here. I hope with everything in me that things continue to go up and up for you!!!
I would love to send you a card!! Please PM me your address?
